metadata.title: CVE-2016-6187 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The apparmor_setprocattr function in security/apparmor/lsm.c in the Linuxkernel before 4.6.5 does not validate the buffer size, which allows localusers to gain privileges by triggering an AppArmor setprocattr hook.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
